heroe: Chat, dice rolls and character sheets! All in one app.
meta_header: RoleEver | Play by chat RPGs application
meta_description: RoleEver is an application to play pen and paper RPGs by chat on your smartphone. All the necessary tools to play at your fingertips. Game chat, character sheets, dice rolls, custom game systems, d&d 5e integrations and much more. RoleEver is available both on iOS and Android!
